seo.title: Prostanorm Forte Case Study: $9,450 in 2 Weeks
seo.description: Discover the winning strategy that generated 81% ROI with Prostanorm Forte in Mexico using Facebook advertising. Complete breakdown of our proven approach.

hero.title: Case Study: $9,450 with Prostanorm Forte in 2 Weeks on FB in Mexico
hero.subtitle: Discover the Winning Strategy That Generated 81% ROI

intro.description1: This case study reveals how we achieved outstanding results with Prostanorm Forte in the Mexican market using Facebook advertising. In just 2 weeks, we generated $9,414 in revenue with a total ad spend of $5,199, resulting in an impressive 81.07% ROI.
intro.description2: Our team leveraged proven strategies in the prostatitis remedy category, utilizing ready-made pre-landings from LuckyOnline's media buying team and adapting them specifically for Facebook campaigns. The results speak for themselves - 1,642 total leads with a 31.85% approval rate.

creativeStrategy.title: Creative Strategy: Proven Winners for LatAm Markets
creativeStrategy.description: Since we'd already worked with the prostatitis category in Mexico, we didn't need to test tons of creatives. We immediately used creatives that had proven effective for prostatitis in LatAm.
insights: This approach generates consistent traffic with minimal rejections
Rejections typically appear within 24 hours if they occur
Lower conversion rates are offset by extremely cheap click prices
Cost per lead remains highly competitive due to volume

whatYoullLearn.title: What You'll Learn: Our Winning Strategy for Prostanorm Forte Campaign
whatYoullLearn.description1: This comprehensive case study will reveal the exact strategies and techniques we used to achieve these outstanding results. You'll discover proven methods that can be applied to your own campaigns in the health and wellness niche.
whatYoullLearn.description2: Through our detailed analysis, you'll gain valuable insights into successful Facebook advertising for health products in Latin American markets. This knowledge will help you understand the nuances of targeting, creative development, and campaign optimization.
whatYoullLearn.description3: Here's what this case study covers:
topics: The traffic pouring scheme that generated consistent results
Converting pre-landing pages adapted from native ads to Facebook
Winning creative approaches specifically for the Mexican market
Technical setup including accounts, payment methods, cloaking, and proxies
Campaign optimization strategies and automated rules
whatYoullLearn.conclusion: By implementing these proven tactics, you'll be able to replicate similar success in your own campaigns. Let's dive into the details!

technicalSetup.title: Technical Setup: The Foundation of Success
technicalSetup.description: Before launching any campaign, proper technical setup is crucial for success. Here's the exact infrastructure we used to ensure smooth operations and avoid common pitfalls that can kill campaigns.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure: Essential Tools and Services

accounts.title: Accounts & Payments
items: FB Accounts: Agency accounts from Fan Agency

infrastructure.conclusion: This technical foundation allowed us to run campaigns safely and scale effectively. The combination of proper cloaking, reliable payment processing, and quality accounts is essential for sustained success in affiliate marketing.

offerSelection.title: Offer Selection: Why Prostanorm Forte
offerSelection.description: Based on the recommendation from manager Emil for driving traffic in Mexico, the Prostanorm Forte offer from the prostatitis remedy category was chosen. This decision was backed by:
reasons: Strong performance history in Latin American markets
High conversion rates for the target demographic (M40+)
Proven demand for prostatitis remedies in Mexico
Competitive payout structure from LuckyOnline network

preLandingStrategy.title: Pre-Landing Strategy: Adapting Proven Winners
preLandingStrategy.description: We didn't have to spend much time or money testing approaches because LuckyOnline provides ready-made pre-landings from their media buying, already tested in native ads. We took two pre-landings with a medical news approach and adapted them for Facebook.

benefits.description: The medical news angle works particularly well because it:
list: Educates users about the problem before presenting the solution
Reduces ad fatigue by appearing as editorial content
Improves Facebook approval rates compared to direct sales pages

creativeStrategy.title: Creative Strategy: Proven Winners for LatAm
creativeStrategy.description: Since we'd already worked with the prostatitis category in Mexico, we didn't need to test tons of creatives. We immediately used creatives that had proven effective for prostatitis in LatAm.

insights.title: Key insights about our creative approach:
list: This approach generates consistent traffic with minimal rejections

Lower conversion rates are offset by extremely cheap click prices

campaignExecution.title: Campaign Execution: The Winning Formula

settings.name: Placements
settings.value: FB News Feed, FB Video Feed, FB Stories, IG Stories, IG Feed

automatedRules.title: Automated Rules for Optimization
automatedRules.description: We always applied automated rules to pause expensive ad sets when they overspin. This crucial optimization prevents budget waste and maintains profitability.
